content:
root = true

[*]
charset = utf-8
end_of_line = lf
indent_size = 2
indent_style = space
insert_final_newline = true
trim_trailing_whitespace = true
curly_bracket_next_line = false
spaces_around_operators = false
spaces_around_brackets = both

[*.md]
trim_trailing_whitespace = false
indent_size = 2

[*{.yml,.ecrc,.nix}]
indent_size = 2
